name: Flashback (/null/dev)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, my first time doing a game jam!

Flashback is based off of the simple concept of running a shooter game backwards in time, starting with empty magazines and dead enemies and working back towards a field of active opponents and full guns. Unfortunately, that doesn't translate easily into code, so I had to scrap some ideas like a shotgun and dynamic enemy bullet tracking fairly late in the jam. Still proud of the result, even if it is a tad unpolished :)
